explanation: The page provides instructions for using the eTax.zug software to electronically file tax returns.
The page provides instructions for using the eTax.zug software for legal entities to file tax returns electronically or in printed form.
The page provides information on regulations and procedures for construction in and around forest areas but does not mention any specific software for instructions.

The page provides instructions for electronically submitting documents to the Handelsregisteramt using a qualified electronic signature and mentions the Open eGov LocalSigner software for this purpose.
The page provides a user manual for the ÖREB-Cadastre within the ZugMap.ch platform.
The page announces the launch of a new online portal for applications to the lottery and sports funds, developed by Ascaion AG.
The page contains frequently asked questions about the use of ZugMap.ch, including instructions for its operation.
The page is a media release warning about a phone scam leading to fraudulent emails that attempt to steal banking login information. It does not provide instructions for any software.
The page does not provide instructions for any software.
The page provides guidance on how to electronically submit tax returns using the eTax.zug software for both natural and legal persons.
The page provides instructions and functionalities for using the ZugMap.ch platform, which offers interactive maps and geoinformation services.
The page provides information on creating a servitude plan using the ZugMap.ch platform, which is necessary for the registration of certain rights in the land registry.
